title: Can't change region
body: Cannot see the option in the store for purchasing change region, i want to move my NA account to Oceania. Is the changing region purchase down right now? Or i am the only one who have this problem. Please let me know how to fix it.

replies.body:
Same problem here, also every time I change region on my client it comes back again.

I moved to Scotland from Brazil about 2 months ago, and I can't play league of legends because Riot doesn't let me..

Ty Rito
